roleset.name: (cause to) move spastically
roleset.note: TWITCH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls crane-40.3.2, body_internal_motion-49. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from twitch.01-v)

example.name: twitch-v: ergative
example.text: If positioned over the brain's motor-control area, the hand-held electromagnets generate nerve impulses that zip down motor nerves and activate muscles, making, say, a finger twitch.

example.name: twitch-v: I'm not a twitch, I'm your wife!
example.text: John twitched his nose and made Mary disappear.

example.name: twitching-n
example.text: Since then , she has had a number of more partial seizures with left arm twitching and some altered sensorium .
